errorHandler.IOError: An input/output error occurred. Please check your disk connection.
errorHandler.ValueError: Invalid file format. Make sure you are using a supported format.
errorHandler.TypeError: Invalid argument type. Please check the input values.
errorHandler.TimeoutError: The operation timed out while trying to open or save the file.
errorHandler.JSONDecodeError: The file is not a valid JSON. Please check the file format.
errorHandler.DatabaseConnectionError: Failed to connect to the database.
errorHandler.RuntimeError: Failed to open the link. Ensure it is valid and you have an active internet connection.
errorHandler.URLError: The link is invalid or the connection could not be established.
errorHandler.FileNotFoundError: The executable file or script was not found. Please check the path.
errorHandler.OSError: A system error occurred while attempting to restart the application. Please restart the application manually.
